headlines.description: In-form forwards Callum Wilson and Anthony Martial were both on target, with Marcus Rashford scoring a stoppage time winner for Manchester United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rashord nets last gasp winner at Bournemouth

headlines.description: On a day fraught with emotion, Leicester City won 1-0 in their first Premier League game since the death of the club's owner.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gray strikes as Leicester beat Cardiff on emotional day

headlines.description: Richarlison continued his fine form for Everton by scoring twice to give them a 3-1 win over Brighton in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Richarlison nets two as Everton beat Brighton

headlines.description: Newcastle United finally got their season up and running by beating Watford 1-0 at to record their first Premier League win of the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Perez strikes as Newcastle win first of the season

headlines.description: Two goals from Felipe Anderson helped secure West Ham United their first win in four matches as they held off a spirited Burnley.
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham earn thrilling win over Burnley

headlines.description: Arsenal forward Alexandre Lacazette rescued a point nine minutes from time for as he cancelled out James Milner's opener at the Emirates.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lacazette earns late point against Liverpool

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur held on nervously to beat Wolverhampton Wanderers 3-2 away in the Premier League on Saturday after conceding two second-half penal
headlines.shortLinkText: Nervy Spurs hang on to win at Wolves
